definition[0]: to hurt yourself or someone else, for example in an accident or an attack
example[0]: Angus injured his leg playing rugby.
example[1]: Two people have been critically injured in an accident.
definition[1]: to cause physical harm to someone or to yourself, for example in an accident
example[2]: He sought compensation after being injured by a defective product.
definition[2]: to make an industry, economy, company, or investor lose money or suffer in some other way
example[3]: The US steel industry was being injured by imports of subsidized steel.
